hero.title: Manage Your ITP Inspections Efficiently
hero.subtitle: Complete management system for ITP stations. Track inspections, manage clients, and never miss an expiration date.

stations.title: Station Management
stations.description: Complete control over your ITP stations. View statistics, manage packages, and monitor performance.

inspections.title: Inspection Tracking
inspections.description: Record and manage all technical inspections with detailed client and vehicle information.

notifications.title: Automatic Notifications
notifications.description: Clients receive automatic reminders when their inspection is about to expire. Never lose a customer again.

contact.title: Want to Collaborate?
contact.description: We're always looking for partnerships with ITP stations. Contact us to discuss how we can work together.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.agreement: By using RoadReady, you agree to these Terms and Conditions and acknowledge that you have read and understood our GDPR compliance measures.

content.p1: Welcome to RoadReady, a management platform for ITP (Periodic Technical Inspection) stations. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
content.p2: These terms apply to all users of the platform: administrators, station owners, and inspectors.

content.p1: RoadReady is a comprehensive management system designed specifically for ITP stations. Our platform provides:
Our platform collects and processes the following types of data:

types.t2: Company information (station name, location, contact details)
types.t3: Client personal data (name, phone number, address)
types.t4: Vehicle information (make, model, license plate, VIN, inspection results)

content.p2: All data is collected with the explicit consent of users and is processed in accordance with GDPR regulations and Romanian data protection laws.

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.r1: Right to Access: Request access to your personal data
rights.r2: Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data
rights.r3: Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data ('right to be forgotten')
rights.r4: Right to Restriction: Request limitation of data processing
rights.r5: Right to Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
rights.r6: Right to Object: Object to processing of your personal data

legal.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legal.content: We process personal data based on: (1) Consent - when you agree to use our services, (2) Contractual necessity - to fulfill our obligations to you, (3) Legal obligation - to comply with Romanian and EU regulations regarding ITP inspections, (4) Legitimate interests - to improve our services and ensure security.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Personal data is retained for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. Inspection records are retained according to Romanian legal requirements for ITP documentation. You may request deletion of your data at any time, subject to legal retention requirements.

security.title: Data Security Measures
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption (HTTPS/TLS), secure authentication (bcrypt password hashing), role-based access control, regular security audits, and secure data backup procedures.

content.p1: We take data security seriously and implement multiple layers of protection:

measures.m1: End-to-end HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
measures.m2: Secure password storage using industry-standard hashing algorithms
measures.m3: Role-based access control to ensure data is only accessible to authorized users
measures.m4: Regular security audits and updates to maintain protection against emerging threats

content.r1: Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials
content.r2: Ensure accuracy of data entered into the system
content.r3: Comply with Romanian regulations regarding ITP inspections
content.r4: Obtain proper consent before entering client personal data
content.r5: Report any security concerns or data breaches immediately

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: RoadReady provides the platform 'as is' and cannot be held liable for: data loss due to user error, unauthorized access due to compromised credentials, incorrect data entered by users, or non-compliance with ITP regulations by users. We maintain reasonable measures to protect data but cannot guarantee absolute security.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or platform notification. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, GDPR requests, or any other concerns, please contact us:
